invocations.description: Looks for a hotkey in the game client which is bound to text text and returns it as a string representation of the keys in the format 'F1', 'Shift+F5', or 'Ctrl+F12'. Optionally, you can specify a type by passing 'manual' or 'automatic' as the type paramter if you're looking for a certain type specifically. Otherwise, any type will be looked for.
